  • » Other Features:>Display size (diagonal): 54.6 cm (21.5")
    >Aspect ratio: 16:09
    >Resolution (native): FHD (1920 x 1080 @ 60 Hz)
    >Pixel pitch: 0.248 mm
    >Brightness: 200 cd/m²
    >Contrast ratio: 600:1 static; 10000000:1 dynamic
    >View angle: 90° horizontal; 65° vertical
    >Response time: 5 ms on/off
    >Tilt and swivel angle: Tilt: -5 to +15°
    >Display features: Anti-glare; Language selection; LED Backlights; On-screen controls; Plug and Play; User programmable
    >Display Input Type: 1 VGA; 1 DVI-D
    >Product color: Black
    >Warranty: 3 Years
